name.ch: 海洋地質與地球物理解釋

goal.en: Learning fundamental knowledge on marine geological and geophysical methods and their applications.
goal.ch: 學習海洋地質及地球物理探勘基本知識，並瞭解如何解釋資料。

content.en:
"2/15 Introduction
2/22 Fundamental of Marine G&G Explorations -I
3/1 Fundamental of Marine G&G Explorations -II
3/8 Fundamental of Marine G&G Explorations -III
3/15 Seismic data format, Seismic data display
3/22 Amplitude correction, Trace editing
3/29 Geometry-I
4/12 Mid-term discussion
4/19 Geometry-II
4/26 Spectral analysis, Filterings
5/3 Covolution, Correlation and Deconvolution
5/10 Velocity Analysis -I
5/17 Velocity Analysis -II
5/24 Velocity Model Building and Stacking
5/31 Final Migration
6/7 Marine G&G Data Interpretations
6/14 Final Presentation and Report"
content.ch:
"授課內容按上課時間由課程簡介、海洋地質地物的基本知識介紹、震測資料介紹與處理、
海洋地質及地球物理資料解釋，最後是進行個人的上台報告與繳交期末書面報告。"

textbook.en: "1. Marine Geophysics (1999), E.J.W. Jones, Wiley press, 474 pages, ISBN: 978-0-471-98694-2. 2. Seismic Data Analysis- Processing, Inversion, and Interpretation of Seismic Data (2001),Oz Yilmaz, ISBN: 978-1-56080-158-0 (on-line). 3. Seismic Data Processing 1st Edition, L. Hatton, MH Worthington and J. Makin, ISBN: 978-0632013746."

grading.en: "Attendancy and Homework: 40% Final processing results: 30% Final presentation: 30%"
grading.ch: "出席、上課表現：40% 資料處理成果：30% 期末報告：30%"

domain.en: 地球物理 、 應用地球物理
domain.ch: 地球物理 、 應用地球物理

en.Assessments: Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments

ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 專題研究報告(書面) ， 實作/實驗
